name: Aquila Favonia
desc: The soul of the Knights of Favonius. Millennia later, it still calls on the winds of swift justice to vanquish all evil — just like the last heroine who wielded it.

values.desc: ATK is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color>. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to <color=#99FFFFFF>100%</color> of ATK and dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>200%</color> of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

ATK is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>25%</color>. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to <color=#99FFFFFF>115%</color> of ATK and dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>230%</color> of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

ATK is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>30%</color>. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to <color=#99FFFFFF>130%</color> of ATK and dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>260%</color> of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

ATK is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>35%</color>. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to <color=#99FFFFFF>145%</color> of ATK and dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>290%</color> of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

ATK is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>40%</color>. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to <color=#99FFFFFF>160%</color> of ATK and dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>320%</color> of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.
